Text.Page:
Come here, trooper. Just north of us the cultists are massing for an attack. {@LinkCreature:17#301220#Mutated elins}, {@LinkCreature:17#300442#Heavens Fall guards}, and a flood of {@LinkCreature:17#300552#barrelhead threshers}.

I think one decisive blow on the battlefield will end this rebellion! Destroy them!

That upstart Puran and his strategies! Real soldiers fight against other soldiers, face to face.

Skulking around killing officers? Pfeh. Only toothless cowards fight that way!
That formation of troops to the north is still gathering, soldier. Get out there and cut them to ribbons!
